allowMouseWheel.description: Whether to allow mouse wheel to change the value

allowOverflow.description: Whether to allow the value overflow the min/max range

clampValueOnBlur.description: Whether to clamp the value when the input loses focus (blur)

disabled.description: Whether the number input is disabled.

focusInputOnChange.description: Whether to focus input when the value changes

form.description: The associate form of the input element.

format.description: If using a custom display format, this converts the default format to the custom format.

getRootNode.description: A root node to correctly resolve document in custom environments. E.x.: Iframes, Electron.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type:
Partial<{
  root: string
  label: string
  input: string
  incrementTrigger: string
  decrementTrigger: string
  scrubber: string
}>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the number input. Useful for composition.

inputMode.description:
Hints at the type of data that might be entered by the user. It also determines
the type of keyboard shown to the user on mobile devices

invalid.description: Whether the number input value is invalid.

max.description: The maximum value of the number input

maxFractionDigits.description: The maximum number of fraction digits to use. Possible values are from 0 to 20;

min.description: The minimum value of the number input

minFractionDigits.description: The minimum number of fraction digits to use. Possible values are from 0 to 20

name.description: The name attribute of the number input. Useful for form submission.

onBlur.description: The value of the input when it is blurred

onChange.description: Function invoked when the value changes

onFocus.description: Function invoked when the number input is focused

onInvalid.description: Function invoked when the value overflows or underflows the min/max range

parse.description: If using a custom display format, this converts the custom format to a format `parseFloat` understands.

pattern.description: The pattern used to check the <input> element's value against

readOnly.description: Whether the number input is readonly

spinOnPress.description: Whether to spin the value when the increment/decrement button is pressed

step.description: The amount to increment or decrement the value by

translations.description: Specifies the localized strings that identifies the accessibility elements and their states

validateCharacter.description:
Whether the pressed key should be allowed in the input.
The default behavior is to allow DOM floating point characters defined by /^[Ee0-9+\-.]$/
